name: Videogamefacts
0:
”Alexa, open video game facts”
”Alexa, start video game facts”
”Alexa, ask video game facts for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: video game facts
des: Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about video games. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
